title: What is the future of public education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sailors Join New Ready, Relevant Training Pilot Program - USNI News With the new “Ready, Relevant Training” program, the Navy has figured out that a mixture of instructors and simulations is what the future schoolhouse will look like. Combine that with a “just in time” element (don't teach advanced topics to students are just learning the basics) and break up learning goals into modules or blocks (so that students can learn at their own pace) and you will see what public school will look like in just a few years.

I think the public school system will soon be a thing of the past…with all the school shootings and the low pay for teachers as well as the ability to have online classes it's almost irrelevant to even have public schools…
